description:
This one’s for the pets. Shop all the things that keep your pet happy and healthy with Chewy, the trusted destination for pet parents. With 3000+ brands of food and supplies, and 24/7 help from pet experts, your pet’s happiness is our #1 priority. Unlock high quality and low priced products, Autoship delivery, free 365-day returns and more. Food shop and pharmacy — no matter what you need, Chewy has you covered.

Download and discover something for every pet. Dog, cat, fish, reptile, horse or wildlife — all pets are supported on the Chewy app. Find everything your pet needs today.

SHOPPING FOR EVERY PET
The shopping app that’s built to make your pet parenting life easier. Shop top brands, exclusive deals and the best of each season for your pet.

Shop by Category - Search or shop by category to discover the best products for your pet.

3000+ Brands - Browse thousands of trusted brands, ensuring you have the best selection possible.

Today’s Deals - Shopping app deals, for every pet. Find the best savings of the day on everything from food to treats, toys, supplies and apparel.

Holiday Shop - Calling all party animals! Celebrate the holiday season with costumes, toys, seasonal treats and more.

PHARMACY & VET SUPPORT
Pet health, made easy. Get veterinary and pharmacy support with Chewy’s expansive health services and products.

Trusted Pet Pharmacy - Care for your pet with America’s most trusted pharmacy, carrying over 4000+ top-quality medications and 600+ veterinary diet products. Now including compounded medications.

Rx Approvals - Share your pet and veterinary info and we’ll confirm your prescription directly with your vet before shipping.

Connect with a Vet - Get timely advice from our licensed veterinary team and leave with a personalized consult report.

Symptom Tracker - Share your pet’s symptoms and receive quick advice on what to do next.

Medicine Reminders - Add your pet’s current medications and we’ll remind you on when to refill based on the frequency you need.

AUTOSHIP & SEAMLESS HOME DELIVERY
Veterinary prescription, pet food, or fun toys — get fast, easy and hassle-free deliveries with Chewy.

Manage Autoship - What your pet needs, on repeat. Schedule your Autoship delivery at checkout and change as needed. No fees or commitments, just happy pets.

Super Savings - Get extra savings off your first Autoship order and 5% off future deliveries.

Shipment Tracker - Follow their favorite box from our door to yours with our in-app shipment tracker.

PET COMMUNITY
Trusted by pet lovers, and supported by pet experts. Learn, receive help, share your voice and give back with our app. No one pet-parents alone with Chewy.


24/7 Support - Real pet experts are here for you 24/7 to support all pet parents.

Sharing - Send fellow pet lovers items you like with a text, email or social post while you shop.

Shopping App Reviews - Read what other customers are saying about products and leave your own reviews.

Pet Adoption - Find pets to adopt near you through Chewy’s network of shelters and rescues.

Food shop, pharmacy, vet advice and more. No matter what you’re looking for — Chewy is here to make pet parenting easier.
